body.description: MDD 16TB 256MB Cache 7200RPM SATA 6.0Gb/s 3.5" Internal Hard Drive for NAS Network Attached Storage. Purpose built for NAS solution, It is perfect for teams needing to save more data and work faster. Designed for Network Storage NAS and featuring 16TB and speeds of up to 200MB/s, these internal hard drives are specifically built for less wear and tear, little to no noise/vibration, no lags or down time, increased file-sharing performance, and lower power consumption. Ideal solution for NAS System (Network Attached Storage) Store more and work faster with a NAS-optimized hard drive providing ultra-high capacity 16TB and cache of up to 256MB Purpose built for NAS enclosures, delivers less wear and tear little to no noise/vibration no lags or down time increased file-sharing performance and much more Easily monitor the health of drives and enjoy long-term reliability with 1M hours MTBF

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Needed these for a 4 drive raid system. Purchased 5 to have an extra.
reviews.reviewText: I’ve worked in IT for 30+ years and needed drives for a raid system in my home. I’m consolidating data from many other drives.Initially, I was concerned due to a few bad reviews on other items from this company. However, the five-year warranty backed by the company selling these drives, plus the fact I was buying a spare, helped me make the decision.I installed four drives into the raid system; they spun up with no errors, and the raid system built a 48TB volume. The software monitoring the drive status continues to report no issues with the drives.I am very happy with this purchase because of the price and definitely purchase more drives in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid performance backed by 5 year warranty...happy camper
reviews.reviewText: This drive is covered by a 5 year warranty . I use this drive to back a very large insect studies data base in excess of 13TB and growing. The backup drive is synced to the primary daily where dependability and speed are important...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow! No speed deamin
reviews.reviewText: I purchased it to backup a 12 drives photo server.It takes a forever and a half to copy the 8TB being used.ZFS does a fantastic job under (Ubuntu) Linux and there are several hundreds mount volumes which store about about 6,000 images in various stages of pre-release.Like I said, it took almost 3 days to dump the data. However, incremental backup is finished in few minutes.As a backup media, it is a very good solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars wow A+++ will buy agin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works fine but a little too deep for Synology Diskstation drive tray.
reviews.reviewText: I just got two of these to upgrade my 10-year old Synology DS412+ Diskstation. These drives were a little difficult to install as they seem to be a little deeper than the Western Digital (or other) drives I have used in the past. Each drive took me at least two tries to mount properly in the drive tray and to be recognized by my Diskstation. So far though, the drives seem to work just fine and run at least a couple of degrees cooler than my old WD NAS drives.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
